DocAttribute.Name: Name
DocAttribute.Documentation: Name by which the coordinate reference system is identified. > NOTE  The name shall be taken from the list recognized by the European Petroleum Survey Group EPSG. It should then be qualified by the EPSG name space, for example as 'EPSG:5555'.

DocAttribute.Name: Description
DocAttribute.Documentation: Informal description of this coordinate reference system.

DocAttribute.Name: GeodeticDatum
VerticalDatum
HasCoordinateOperation
DocAttribute.Documentation: Indicates conversion between coordinate systems. In particular it refers to an _IfcCoordinateOperation_ between this coordinate reference system, and another Geographic coordinate reference system.
